data.comment: The big names in today's match at Olympisch Stadion have now been confirmed.
Frederik Geldhof starts the match. Beerschot with the kick-off in Antwerp.
In the minute 12, Beerschot take a 1-0 lead thanks to Raphael Holzhauser.
Genk have been awarded a penalty in Antwerp...
Goal! The away team is awarded a penalty in Antwerp. Paul Onuachu converts to level the scoring at 1-1.
In the minute 45, The first-half is over at Olympisch Stadion.
Genk kick-off the second-half u- the match is underway again!
Goal! Pierre Bourdin heads Beerschot into a 2-1 lead.
In the minute 58, Carlos Cuesta (Genk) gets a yellow card.
Red card in Antwerp! Carlos Cuesta has been shown a second yellow card by Frederik Geldhof.
In the minute 62, Penalty! Frederik Geldhof points to the spot, great chance for Beerschot...
Kouassi Eboue (Genk) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Beerschot are going well in Antwerp. They now lead 3-1 thanks to a Raphael Holzhauser penalty.
The away team have replaced Paul Onuachu with Cyriel Dessers. This is the first substitution made today by Hannes Wolf.
In the minute 65, Hannes Wolf is making the team's second substitution at Olympisch Stadion with Luca Oyen replacing Kristian Thorstvedt.
He's off! Theo Bongonda is shown a red card.
Jhon Lucumi (Genk) has received a first yellow card.
In the minute 75, An attacking Genk player has been brought down in the area ... It's a penalty!
Goal! Genk now trail just 3-2 thanks to a Cyriel Dessers spot-kick.
Yan Vorogovskiy is on a sub for Jan Van den Bergh for Beerschot.
In the minute 81, The away team replace Kouassi Eboue with Elias Sierra.
Beerschot make their second substitution with Dario Van Den Buijs replacing Ryan Sanusi.
Goal! Beerschot extend their lead to 4-2 through Yan Vorogovskiy.
That's full-time at Olympisch Stadion. The final score is 5-2.
Goal! Marius Noubissi extends Beerschot's lead to 5-2.
